modio::Event.md - Grip

The Event object is returned by the Events functions. They represent events triggered by mods.

class Event
{
public:
  u32 id;
  u32 mod_id;
  u32 user_id;
  u32 event_type;
  long date_added;
};

API schema: Event Object

C compatible base object: ModioEvent

Name Type Description
id u32 Event's unique identifier
mod_id u32 Parrent Mod's unique identifier
user_id u32 Unique id of the user who performed the action.
user_id u32 User's unique identifier
event_type std::string Event type value
date_added u32 Unix timestamp of when the event occurred
